posts.post_title: T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC 50 For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have a very nice SGC 50 T206 Cy Young portrait for sale. The price is $900. I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order or a check. You can contact me directly at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url] to buy the card.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-512b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-512rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
Are you sure that it's PSA? :)
